hero_subtitle: Shekaru biyar cikin yaki, me ya yi saura a kasar?
intro_paragraph: An shafe shekara biyar ana yaki a Syria wanda ya yi sanadiyar mutuwar mutane 250,000. Miliyoyin mutane sun tsere daga kasar saboda yaki, amma kusan mutane miliyan 18 na cigaba da zama a kasar da yaki ya yiwa kaca-kaca - to ko ya rayuwa ta kasance musu?
section_1_paragraph: A birane da dama barazanar mutuwa da jikkata abu ne da ya zama jiki. Kowa a Syria zai iya sanin mutanen da suka rasa rayukansu - sai dai ba za a taba iya sanin yawan mutanen da suka mutu ba. Cibiyar tara bayanai kan take hakkin dan adam, wata kungiya ce me fafutika a kasar Syria da ke ajiye bayanai a kan wadanda suka mutu da dalilan da ya haddasa mutuwarsu.  Ga sunayen yara wadanda kungiyar ta tabbatar da mutuwarsu a lokacin yakin basasar.
ticker_para_part1: Zai iya daukar tsawon lokaci kafin a gama karanta sunayen wadanda suka mutu
threestages_paragraph: Yawan fararen hula da aka kashe a duk wata
threestages_shootings_paragraph: Al'amarin da ya fara a matsayin zanga-zangar lumana kanadawa da mulkin shugaba Assad a watan Maris din shekarar 2011, ya zamo tashin hankali bayan jami'an tsaro sun yi amfani da karfin tuwo kan fararen hula.
threestages_shootings_key: Mace-mace da aka yi ta hanyar harbi
threestages_mortar_paragraph: Rikicin ya fi muni a shekarar 2012, yayin da da kashe-kashen su ka zama abin da ake yi kullum kuma hare-haren da ake kai wa da bindigar igwa ya yi sanadin kashe rayuka da dama.
threestages_mortar_key: Mace-mace da aka yi ta hanyar harbi da bindigar Igwa
threestages_airstrikes_paragraph: Da gwamanti ta lura bata samun nasara, sai dakarunta suka koma kai hare-hare ta sama, kafin gamayyar kawancen da Amurka ke jagoranta a watan Satumbar shekarar 2014 da Rasha a watan Satumbar shekarar 2015 ta fara hare-haren ta sama.

section_2_title: Menene yawan mutanen da ke Syria har yanzu?
section_2_paragraph: Majalisar dinkin duniya ta yi kiyasin cewar har yanzu mutane miliyan 17.9 su na zaune a Syria - alkaluman sun ragu daga mutane miliyan 24.5 kafin a fara yakin.  Fiye da mutane miliyan 6 sun zama 'yan gudun hijira a cikin kasarsu bayan a matsa musu sun tsere daga gidajensu domin neman wani wurin da ya fi kwanciyar hanakali.  Amma ina su ke zama? Yawan mutane a larduna da dama sun ragu kuma akasarin wadanda su ka ragu sun tsere daga biranen domin neman muhalli a wajen gari.  Rayuwa na cigaba kamar dai kullun a sassa daban na babban birnin, Damasacus, amma a wasu wuraren miliyoyin mutane suna fafutikar yin rayuwa.  Majalisar dinkin duniya ta ce mutane miliyan 13.5 na bukatar agajin jin kai, da miliyoyin mutanen da ke wuraren da ke da wuyar shiga da yankunan da aka yiwa kawanya kamar Deir al-Zour.

section_3_title: Ya ya rayuwa ta ke ga wadanda su ke can har yanzu?
section_3_paragraph: Shekara biyar da aka shafe na yakin Syria din ya lalata komai na kasar banda tatalin arzikin ta, inda gaba daya kiyasin kudaden tatatlin arzikin kasar da cibiyar gudanar da bincike na Syria ta fitar  ta ka dala biliyan 225.  AA yayinda ake kiyasin cewa rashin aikin yi ya haura sama da kashi 50 cikin 100, ya yi sama daga kashi 14 cikin 100 a shekarar 2011, iyalai a Syria suna fafutika a kullun domin cimma burin rayuwa.  Kusan kashi 70 na mutane su na fama da matsanancin talauci da rashin iya samun abinci da ma wasu abubuwan na rayuwa wanda basu danganci abinci ba.  Fafutikar da su ke yi na tsananta saboda halin da harkar noman Syria ke ciki.  A baya yana daga cikin manyan bangaren tatalin arzikin kasar, rikicin Syria ya sa samar da abinci da fitar da shi ya lalace kuma larduna da dama suna fama da matsanancin karancin abinci.
section_4_paragraph: Ana cigaba da amfani da abinci a matsayin makami, yayinda ake yawan karkatar da agaji zuwa hannun da ba kamata ba ko kuma zuwa yankunan da gwamantin ta amince.  Rahotannin mutanen da ke rasa rayukansu sakamakon yunwa ya bayyana daga yankunan da aka yiwa kanwanya kamar gabashin Ghouta, yankin da ke karkashin ikon 'yan tawaye a garin Damascus.  A yayinda ake fuskantar takaitacen harkar samar da abinci kuma babu tabas a wurin samun agaji, samun kayan more rayuwa yana da matukar wahalar samu da tsada a yakuna ndaban daban na kasar.  Misali, Biredi abinci ne da ake ci sosai a kasar larabawa.  Kafin yakin, gwamantin Syriar ta dauke wani bangare na kudin da wasu kayan abincin a wani bangare na tsarin kulawa na gwamanti ga 'yan kasar, inda ta yi fatan samun goyon bayan mutanenta.  Amma bayan ta rasa goyon bayan 'yan kasar a akasarin yankunan da ke samar da alkama, sai gwamnati ta cire wannan tallafin sai farashin biredi ya tashi sosai.  Shugaba Bashar al-Assad ya magance matsalar ta hanyar shigo da alkama daga kasar Ukraine da Rasha, wanda hakan ya sauka da farashin a yankunan da ke karkashin ikon gwamnati kamar Damascus.

section_5_title: Samar da lafiya a lokacin Yaki
section_5_paragraph: A yayinda mutane da dama su ke da hadarin samun rauni ko kamuwa da rashin lafiya, samar da kulawa ya zama muhimmin abu.  Duk da haka, cigaba da yaki da ake yi asibitotci kasar da dama suna fuskantar hare-hare.  Tsakanin somawar yakin a shekarar 2011 da Numabar shekarar 2015, likitoci masu kare hakkin dan adam sun tara wasu bayanai 336 a kan hare-hare a kan a kalla asibitoci 240 a kasar.  Wadannan hare-haren sun yi sandiyar mace-macen ma'aikatan lafiya 697.
section_5_paragraph_2: Yawan ma'aikatan lafiya ya yi kasa sosai zuwa kashi 55 cikin 100 kafin yakin.  Rashin tsaron yana jawo rashin samun isassun kulawar lafiya ga ma'aikatan lafiya da masu bukatar kulawa.  Samun asibiti ya zama abin wahala, inda sama da kashi 40 cikin 100 na mutanen kasar basu iya samun kulawar lafiya.  A cikin asibitocin gwamnati 113, kashi 58 daga cikinsu suna yin aiki kadan ko kuma basa aiki kwata-kwata.
hospitals_text_part_4_bottom: Suna aiki kadan ko basa aiki kwata-kwata
hospitals_source: Bayanai: Likitocin kare hakkin dan adam na majalisar dinkin duniya
section_6_paragraph: An kashe dubun dubatar yara tun shekarar 2011, amma ko ga wadanda su ka rayu, basu da tabbacin a kan yadda rayuwar zata kasance.  A yayinda iyalai su ka tsere daga Syria domin samun muhallin da za su samu kwanciyar hanakali, yawan yara wadanda suka isa zuwa makaranta ya ragu - akwai ragowar yara kadan da miliyan daya a shekarar 2010.  Kuma wadanda su ke can har yanzu, sama da kashi 40 cikin 100 sun daina zuwa makaranta.  Tsarin karatun kasar Syria ya lalace sanadiyar yaki, yayinda 1 cikin 4 na makarantu sun lalace, ko kuma ana amfani da su a matsayin muhalli ko a mayar da su ginin sojoji.  Ko da a ce makarantu suna cikin kyaun yanayi, akasarinsu ba za su iya budewa ba, yayinda kusan kaso daya cikin hudu na malaman makarantar su 52,500 sun bar wuraren aikinsu.
